grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 更【コウ】one-fifth of the night (approx. 2 hours)
更改【コウカイ】renewal, extension, revision
中更【チュウコウ】middle watch, 12-2 am
五更【ゴコウ】the five night watches, fifth watch of the night (approx. 3 am to 5 am)
kun reading compounds: 新【さら】new, unused, new, obvious, natural
更に【さらに】furthermore, again, after all, more and more, moreover, even more
殊更【ことさら】intentionally, deliberately, especially, particularly
更々【さらさら】(not) at all, (not) in the least, (none) whatsoever
更に【さらに】furthermore, again, after all, more and more, moreover, even more
さらに困ったことに【さらにこまったことに】to make matters worse
更ける【ふける】to get late, to advance, to wear on
更かす【ふかす】to sit up late
